tags.name: basic-list-element
tags.description: A selectable list component with a label and an action counter

properties.name: name
properties.description: A name of the property to be set by the list

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Controls whether multiple options can be selected

properties.name: defaultSelectionIndex
properties.description: Which options should be selected by default

properties.name: selected
properties.description: A getter to retrieve selected html elements

properties.name: selectedIndexes
properties.description: A getter to retrieve an Array with indexes of selected options

properties.name: __items
properties.description: An immutable array of references to html content of all options. Populated with lightDom children upon construction

properties.name: __selectedIndexes
properties.description: A Set of indexes of selected options
properties.default: empty Set or Set of defaultSelectionIndex

properties.name: __selectItem(itemIndex: number)
properties.description: private method to select item with index of itemIndex

properties.name: __deselectItem(itemIndex: number)
properties.description: private method to unselect item of itemIndex

properties.name: __toggleItemSelection(index: number)
properties.description: private method which inverts the selected state of item with index

events.name: selection-changed
events.description: Event fires when options have been selected

slots.summary: Default slot that has items content
slots.description: Default slot that has items content
